name: llm-notify-vscode
displayName: LLM Notify - Claude Code + Codex Monitor
description: Get notified when Claude Code or Codex finishes generating responses

llmNotify.enabled.description: Enable notifications when Claude Code completes

llmNotify.hubUrl.description: URL of the LLM Notify Hub server

llmNotify.showVSCodeNotification.description: Show VS Code notification when Claude Code completes

llmNotify.detectClaudeCode.description: Monitor terminal for Claude Code completion

llmNotify.claudePromptPattern.description: Regex for Claude Code prompt in terminal output

llmNotify.claudeOutputPattern.description: Regex for Claude Code output in terminal output

llmNotify.claudeCompletePattern.description: Regex for Claude Code completion marker in terminal output

llmNotify.debugTerminalData.description: Log terminal data snippets to the LLM Notify output channel

llmNotify.claudeLogPath.description: Path to a Claude Code terminal log file to watch (fallback when terminal output events are unavailable)

llmNotify.claudeSsePort.description: Claude Code SSE port (from CLAUDE_CODE_SSE_PORT). If set, LLM Notify will use SSE events for accurate start/complete detection.

llmNotify.codexSessionsDir.description: Path to Codex sessions directory (defaults to ~/.codex/sessions). Used to detect Codex CLI and VS Code chat activity.
